text: Mr Dursley sat frozen in his armchair, shooting stars all over Britain, owls flying by daylight, mysterious people in cloaks all over the place, and a whisper, a whisper about the potters.

segments.text: Mr Dursley sat frozen in his armchair, shooting stars all over Britain, owls flying by daylight,
mysterious people in cloaks all over the place, and a whisper, a whisper about the potters.
